name: Kart Attack (itch)
description:
Welcome to Kart Attack, one of the most thrilling racing experiences you can get your hands on. With a selection of fantastic tracks and a cast of karts each with a unique style and ability, you and up to three friends (or CPU competitors if you like a challenge) battle for domination of the race. Use power-ups and your kart's special ability to get an edge over your opponents and, hopefully, avoid the return fire. 

Ready, Set, GO!

Features
  • Local splitscreen multiplayer
  • Quick race
  • Tournament mode
  • Time trials
  • 5 Tracks
  • 9 Karts 
  • Unlockable Kart skins
  • Kart specific abilities
  • Power-Ups
  • Xbox One and PS4 controller support
